mapper.select: select t.id as id, t.user_id as userId, t.project_id as projectId, t.title as title, t.status as status, t.run_status as runStatus, t.last_run_date as lastRunDate, t.last_modify as lastModify, t.version as version, t.create_time as createTime, t.update_time as updateTime, t.ped as ped, t.author_name as authorName, t.description as description, t.assign_to as assignTo, t.notifiy_list as notifiyList from test_cycle t where t.id = #{id} and t.user_id = #{masterId}
mapper.update:
update oneclick.test_cycle
title = #{title},
status = #{status},
run_status = #{runStatus},
last_run_date = #{lastRunDate},
last_modify = #{lastModify},
description = #{description},
version = #{version},
ped = #{ped},
author_name = #{authorName},
notifiy_list = #{notifiyList},
assign_to = #{assignTo},
run_status = #{runStatus},
step_status = #{stepStatus},
update_time = NOW()
where id = #{id}
